0P0000MPRT.HK.long_name: HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund-SuperTrust Plus Global Bond
0P0000MPRT.HK.summary:
The investment objective of the Global Bond Fund is to achieve stable capital growth with low volatility. This Fund shall be invested in an authorised unit trust (HSBC MPF âAâ - Global
Bond Fund) primarily investing in a portfolio of carefully selected global fixed income securities. Such investments will be made
through further approved pooled investment funds and/or other investments as allowed under the General Regulation. The investment advisers and investment sub-advisers appointed
to manage the investments of the underlying approved pooled investment funds are members of the HSBC Group.

0P0000P7N1.F.summary: The investment objective of the Global Bond Fund is to seek to achieve sustainable income and modest capital appreciation through investment primarily in investment grade, debt securities which may be sovereign, supranational, corporate, mortgage or securitised debt securities.

0P0000S2WQ.HK.long_name: BCOM Joyful Retirement MPF Scheme-BCOM Global Bond (CF) Fund

0P0000SV6L.L.long_name: Threadneedle Global Bond Fund Retail Gross Accumulation GBP
0P0000SV6L.L.summary: The Fund aims to provide income with the prospect of some capital growth over the long term. It looks to outperform the JP Morgan Government Bond Index Global (GBI Global) over rolling 3-year periods, after the deduction of charges. The Fund is actively managed, and invests at least two-thirds of its assets in bonds issued or guaranteed by governments, government agencies or quasigovernment entities worldwide. In addition, the Fund may invest in other bonds, including bonds issued by companies.
0P0000SV6L.L.manager_bio:
Dave Chappell is a Senior Portfolio Manager in the interest rate and currency team within Fixed Income and is at the core of US and UK rate and economic forecasting for the company. Dave manages a broad range of US and UK fixed income mandates for numerous insurance companies. He also manages a number of global government portfolios.

Dave joined the company in 1997 when Scudder Investments became part of Threadneedle Asset Management Limited. He joined Scudder Investments as a fixed income dealer, and in 1997 became an Insurance Asset Portfolio Manager.

He started his career in 1987 at Royal Bank of Scotland as an Operations Supervisor before moving to Irving Trust company as an Operations Manager.

0P0000VGVJ.F.summary: The fund currently focuses on local currency investments beyond the key currencies (EUR, USD, GBP, JPY). Using the SOP Solidity Index our experts compare at least twice a year more than 50 countries. Selected are only the best. Their fundamental strength bodes well for sound government bonds and appreciation potential for their currencies. The special feature: borrowers, currencies and interest rates are managed independently in an active way. Investment horizon: mid-term.

0P0001AIZS.L.long_name: VT Redlands ICVC - VT Redlands Fixed Income Portfolio A GBP Acc
0P0001AIZS.L.summary: The objective of the VT Redlands Fixed Income Portfolio is to provide capital growth. The Fund seeks to achieve its objective primarily by investing in collective investment vehicles (including for example collective investment schemes, exchange traded funds and investment trusts) which provide exposure to fixed income strategies and assets. The Fund may also invest in other collective investment schemes, transferable securities, bonds, money market instruments, deposits, cash and near cash.

NMEXHQ.MI.short_name: NEW MILLENNIUM EX EUR HIGH QUAL
NMEXHQ.MI.long_name: New Millennium - Augustum Extra Euro High Quality Bond L
NMEXHQ.MI.summary: The aim of the Sub-Fund is to achieve an excess return on the one usually achievable through euro bond market, investing in debt instruments not denominated in euro currency, combining interest income and capital appreciation also coming from the exchange rate performance.

NNGLO.AS.manager_bio:
Senior Portfolio Manager Core FI
Joined ING IM in: 1985
Main responsibilities: Hans is Senior Portfolio Manager at the Core FI team, being responsible for global core fixed income investment policy and model portfolio construction. He is also responsible for managing flagship fixed income mutual funds.
Previous work experience: Prior to this, Hans was employed in the investment department of Nationale-Nederlanden (which later merged into ING Investment Management) starting in 1985 as a fixed income fund manager, with a focus on private placements. He began his career in 1977 at Amfas Group (now part of ING Group) as a portfolio manager.
Education: HES Rotterdam.
Relevant experience since: 1977
